members.name: Angela
abilities: Celestial light projection
Protective warding auras
Emotional healing and comfort
members.bio: Angela, known as Celestial Angel, is the heart-center of the Olympians and the Cummings clan. Her light shields and quiet strength keep the wider family grounded when the cosmos goes sideways.
history: Stood as an early moral anchor for the future Titans and Olympians
Sheltered younger cousins during the early threats around Zion City
Helped Night Hawk and Emma reconcile duty, faith, and hero work
members.notes: Often depicted as a calm, radiant presence—if she raises her voice, everyone knows it’s serious.

members.name: Todd
members.role: Tactical overseer and starship legacy holder
abilities: Stellar-energy channeling
Long-range battlefield awareness
Starship command intuition
members.bio: Todd, called Stellar, carries the legacy of the USS Angel-A and serves as a quiet strategist behind many Parliament-era operations. His counsel guides Night Hawk and the cousins when stakes go cosmic.
history: Supported early Titans operations from the periphery of Zion City
Passed down the legacy of the Angel-A and exploration values to his children
Helped unify extended family branches into the Olympians framework
members.notes: Seen as both a dad and an admiral figure—rarely out front, but always watching the board.

members.name: Molly
abilities: Danger sense around the family home
Morale boosting
Unconditional loyalty
members.bio: Molly, the Teddy Bear, is more than a pet—she’s an emotional anchor. When the heroes come home from impossible missions, she’s the first to greet them like nothing could ever take them away.
history: Present through the formative years of Night Hawk and Emma
Comforted family members after multiple post-Incident losses and scares
members.notes: In-universe jokes claim she has a higher emotional-resilience stat than most heroes.

members.name: Mary
members.role: McNeil family matriarch and moral compass
abilities: Golden barrier generation
Supportive aura that strengthens allies
Resource-blessing (boosting supplies and logistics)
members.bio: Mary, known as Auric, is the golden backbone of the McNeil line. Her calm strength and protective nature helped raise three of the core Titans and hold the extended family together.
history: Raised Spencer, Jared, and Jennifer through the pre-Incident era of Zion City
Protected extended family safe houses during early Maw incursions
Frequently mediates between fiery personalities in family councils
members.notes: Her power theme is ‘golden stewardship’—protecting both people and what sustains them.

members.name: Chance
abilities: Crimson energy greatsword manifestation
Command auras that sharpen ally focus
Tactical foresight in chaotic battles
members.bio: Crimson Crown is a field-general archetype: stoic, decisive, and fiercely protective of his family and city. His influence helped push Spencer toward leadership and honor instead of bitterness.
history: Encouraged Spencer’s transition from raw power to true leadership as Annihilator
Helped evacuate civilians during early waves of The Incident
Occasionally consulted by the Parliament for ground-level perspectives
members.notes: His crown motif symbolizes responsibility, not ego—he wears the weight of his choices.

members.name: Ava
abilities: Prismatic energy bursts that can heal, shield, or stun
Color-coded signal flares for complex coordination
Emotional resonance that calms panic in civilians
members.bio: Ava channels prismatic energy as a flexible support power, switching between roles depending on what the family needs in that moment.
history: Served as a field medic and signal officer for family-led operations
Helped stabilize injured Legionaires and younger Olympians after Maw skirmishes
members.notes: Her color palette and effects often echo the emotional state of the group she’s with.

members.name: Charlie
abilities: Heavy arcane-tech armor
Superhuman strength and durability
Shield-based crowd control
members.bio: Charlie, the Iron Olympian, is built like a walking fortress—often placed where the line absolutely cannot break.
history: Helped hold defensive lines in the Telestial sector during multiple evacuations
Often partners with cousins from the Cummings side when heavy support is needed
members.notes: Quiet off the field, thunderous on it.

members.name: Lumi
abilities: Blending into low light and shadowy environments
Finding isolated or injured family members
Soothing anxiety through presence
members.bio: Lumi is the shadow-pup of the McNeils, often found right beside those who’ve just come back from something traumatic.
history: Frequently present during debriefs after high-risk missions
Became unofficial mascot of several smaller rescue ops involving younger cousins
members.notes: Fans joke that Lumi and Molly have their own secret side-team.

members.name: Heather S
abilities: Plant and growth manipulation
Regenerative healing fields
Environmental shielding with living barriers

faction_connections: Thunder Born (through Ben and Azure’s network)

members.bio: Heather S, Verdant, is a living greenhouse of protection and calm, providing a literal and emotional safe space for the Briggs and their extended family.
history: Sheltered family and allies in living sanctuaries during Outer Darkness incursions
Helped Ben and Azure stabilize after high-intensity missions with healing fields
members.notes: Her gardens are half battlefield tool, half sacred family refuge.

members.name: Bobby
members.role: Primary combat medic of the Briggs branch
abilities: Advanced medical expertise enhanced by arcane-tech tools
Stabilizing auras that slow bleeding and dampen pain
Rapid triage analysis in chaotic situations
members.bio: As Crown Medic, Bobby operates on the front lines of disaster, patching up heroes and civilians alike.
history: Provided emergency support during multiple Titan missions gone sideways
Helped design standard medical response kits used across Olympian branches
members.notes: He has a reputation for firm bedside manner: kind, but no nonsense.

members.name: Liberty
abilities: Calming aura fields that reduce aggression
Light barriers that deflect attacks without harming attackers
Empathic sensing to read emotional tension
members.bio: Liberty embodies serenity in motion, often placed between clashing personalities or on the edges of tense negotiations.
history: Helped de-escalate multiple near-fights between different factions and teams
Frequently deployed when Maw trauma fallout causes panic in safe zones
members.notes: Her armor and aura design deliberately evoke peace, not intimidation.

members.name: Ammon
abilities: Courage amplification for nearby allies
High-mobility melee combat
Energy constructs shaped like shields and banners
members.bio: Valoron charges where others hesitate, turning fear into momentum.
history: Led several dangerous pushbacks when Telestial forces breached safe perimeters
Known for refusing to abandon pinned-down allies even against bad odds
members.notes: High synergy with Liberty’s calming fields and Heather’s plant shields.

members.name: Piper
abilities: High-speed flight
Precision strike runs
Long-range recon and rapid relay
members.bio: Jetstrike is the family’s quickest aerial blade, scouting ahead and hitting hard when needed.
history: Often first on scene for family-based response missions
Worked joint ops with Titans and Cobros 314 as fast air support
members.notes: Probably has the best ‘flybys past Night Hawk’s car’ stories.

members.name: Gemma
members.role: Agile family scout and emotional support
abilities: High-speed ground scouting
Tracking family members by scent even across chaos
Comic relief and morale restoration
members.bio: Gemma, the Slendowg, is the long-legged streak of joy sprinting through the Briggs household and battle lines alike.
history: Known for finding lost kids and cousins during large family events and evacuations
Unofficial mascot for multiple younger Olympians
members.notes: Her codename is as much an inside joke as it is a legend.

members.name: Savannah
abilities: Emotion-linked light auras that brighten ally morale
Colorfield bursts that disorient hostile forces
Low-level healing warmth through touch and proximity
Protective flares that deflect minor projectiles
members.bio: Savannah "Vivid Spark" Jensen is the heartlight of her branch of the family, radiating color, warmth, and stability. Her presence keeps the Jensen household emotionally grounded even when cosmic chaos brushes against their lives.
history: Supported younger Olympians through difficult personal and spiritual transitions
Served as an informal counselor during early Maw disturbances near the family
Helped host several cross-family gatherings that strengthened Olympian unity
members.notes: Her aura tends to brighten and change color based on the emotional state of the room.

members.name: Lee
abilities: On-the-fly scripting of arcane-tech subroutines
Stabilization of glitching or corrupted systems
HUD-assisted diagnostics for damaged armor and devices
Support drones that handle minor repairs mid-mission
members.bio: Lee "Codeforge" Jensen is the quiet engineer behind many of the family’s tech comforts. He’s less of a frontline warrior and more of a craftsman who keeps critical infrastructure humming.
history: Helped adapt civilian tech to handle emergency Parliament alerts
Assisted in refurbishing damaged Olympian armor between battles
Consulted on secure data storage for family records and histories
members.notes: Prefers workbenches and terminals to battlefields but will deploy when the family truly needs him.

members.name: Emilee
abilities: Voice-linked light waves that can soothe or stun
Resonant barriers woven from melody and radiance
Ability to synchronize heartbeats and breathing of nearby allies
Subtle sonic pulses to disrupt hostile coordination
members.bio: Emilee "Luminous Aria" Jensen turns song into shield and spotlight. Her harmonies can settle panic, strengthen courage, and—when necessary—drop enemies to their knees with a single sharp note.
history: Provided musical and emotional support during multiple cross-family gatherings
Assisted in calming civilians during emergency evacuations
Frequently coordinates with other support-focused Olympians for joint operations
members.notes: Her power is at its strongest when she’s protecting people she personally knows.

members.name: Samantha
abilities: Enhanced agility and burst-speed dashes
Kinetic echo trails that confuse pursuers
Parkour-level mobility in urban and interior spaces
Tactical data relays routed through a wrist-comms mesh
members.bio: Samantha "Velocity Vibe" Jensen is motion given purpose. She thrives on weaving through tight spaces, delivering data, and scouting paths before others even know there’s a threat.
history: Served as a runner between Olympians, Titans, and Legionaires during early coordination efforts
Helped map safe routes through Maw-adjacent disturbance zones
Frequently assigned to quick-response errands that require both speed and trust
members.notes: She dislikes staying still and often volunteers for the most mobile roles available.

members.name: Ella
abilities: Low-altitude flight with agile maneuvering
Wind-assisted glides that generate calming ambient tones
Wide-angle visual scouting from above
Subtle pressure-wave bursts to disrupt incoming projectiles
members.bio: Ella "Aerial Serenade" Jensen mixes sky-dancing with soft tactical support. From above, she can both scout ahead and weave gentle sound currents that steady allies’ nerves.
history: Provided overwatch during several extended-family outdoor gatherings and training exercises
Helped spot early signs of Maw storms encroaching near safe zones
Frequently paired with ground-based cousins as their personal aerial guardian
members.notes: Feels most at peace when she has open sky, music in her head, and family within sight below.
